column2: Peloton Interactive, Inc. operates at-home fitness platform for live and on-demand indoor cycling classes. The company is headquartered in New York, New York and currently employs 1,977 full-time employees. The firm provides connected, technology-enabled fitness and the streaming of instructor-led boutique classes to its members. The firm operates and manages its business in three reportable segments: connected fitness product segment, subscription segment, and other segment. Its connected fitness product segment consists of its Bike and Tread and related accessories. Its other segment consists of Peloton branded apparels.
